p:
Swiss Target Prediction is an online tool that created in 2014 in order to predict the potential targets for any small molecule
35 . This tool can deduce the best potential macromolecular targets for the small molecules, assumed as bioactives. The predictions are based on 2D and 3D similarity combination with a library includes more than 370â€™000 known actives towards more than three thousands proteins from 3 different species
36 . In this study we utilised the online SwissTargetPrediction tool to explore the potential enzymatic targets for the herein reported pyridazine derivatives.
